name: Chang
description:
WebChang is a strategy game like chess, playable by anyone and very easy to understand, for 2 players in local, sorry but there is no AI in this game. This game is based on a prototype of board game  that I created, made with Construct2.

Players must block the two elephants of the opposing team before our own elephants are blocked. So if you cannot move our elephants, you losed.
